items.content_html:
Sorry this is late life got hectic for the past month

Summary

Adds 16.0 Samsung Internet, mirrored by script from Chrome data
items.title: Add Samsung Internet 16.0; mirror data from Chrome Android
Add/update link to backdrop-filter support in Firefox
Link WebKit bug for :focus-visible support

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the devicemotion_event member of the Window API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v4.0.0).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/Window/devicemotion_event

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Add Chromium versions for api.Window.devicemotion_event

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the loadend_event member of the XMLHttpRequest API, based upon manual testing.

Test Code Used: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/XMLHttpRequest/loadend_event
items.title: Add Safari versions for api.XMLHttpRequest.loadend_event

items.content_html:
Summary

Sets Chrome 95 as stable

Test results and supporting details

Waiting on release notes on Tuesday

https://www.chromestatus.com/roadmap - for the Chrome 97 release date.
items.title: Set Chrome 95 as stable

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Safari (Desktop and iOS/iPadOS) for the all_elements_selector member of the Element API, based upon manual testing.

Test Code Used: document.getElementsByTagName('*'); document.getElementsByTagNameNS('https://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml', "*");
items.title: Add Safari versions for api.Element.all_elements_selector

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Firefox and Firefox Android for the all_elements_selector member of the Element API, based upon manual testing.

Test Code Used: document.getElementsByTagName('*'); document.getElementsByTagNameNS('https://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml', "*");
items.title: Add Firefox versions for api.Element.all_elements_selector

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Firefox and Firefox Android for the copy and cut events of the Element API, based upon manual testing.

Test Code Used:

<div id="test">
	<div id="source" contenteditable="true">Try copying text from this box...</div>
	<div id="target" contenteditable="true">...and pasting it into this one</div>
</div>

<script>
	var source = document.getElementById('source');
	var target = document.getElementById('target');

	source.addEventListener('copy', function() {
		alert('Copy!');
	});

	source.addEventListener('cut', function() {
		alert('Cut!');
	});

	target.addEventListener('paste', function() {
		alert('Paste!');
	});
</script>
items.title: Add Firefox versions for api.Element.copy/cut_event

items.content_html:
This PR adds real values for Internet Explorer for the copy, cut, and paste events of the Element API, based upon manual testing.

Test Code Used:

<div id="test">
	<div id="source" contenteditable="true">Try copying text from this box...</div>
	<div id="target" contenteditable="true">...and pasting it into this one</div>
</div>

<script>
	var source = document.getElementById('source');
	var target = document.getElementById('target');

	source.addEventListener('copy', function() {
		alert('Copy!');
	});

	source.addEventListener('cut', function() {
		alert('Cut!');
	});

	target.addEventListener('paste', function() {
		alert('Paste!');
	});
</script>
items.title: Add IE versions for api.Element.[copy/cut/paste]_event

items.content_html:

items.title: Add IE versions for api.Document.wheel_event

items.content_html:
This PR removes irrelevant flag data for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the getAnimations member of the Element API as per the corresponding data guidelines.

This PR was created from results of a script designed to remove irrelevant flags.
items.title: Remove irrelevant Chromium flag data for api.Element.getAnimations
